ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Have you ever smoked cigarettes?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1-2 Times; 2= 3-5 Times; 3= 6-9 Times; 4= 10-19 Times; 5= 20-39 Times; 6= 40+ Times; 999= Not Answered

ElementDescription: Have you had alcoholic beverages (including beer, wine, & liquor) to drink?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1-2 Times; 2= 3-5 Times; 3= 6-9 Times; 4= 10-19 Times; 5= 20-39 Times; 6= 40+ Times; 999= Not Answered

ElementDescription: Have you used marijuana (grass, pot) or hashish (hash, hash oil)?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1-2 Times; 2= 3-5 Times; 3= 6-9 Times; 4= 10-19 Times; 5= 20-39 Times; 6= 40+ Times; 999= Not Answered

ElementDescription: Have you used hard drugs other than alcohol or marijuana?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1-2 Times; 2= 3-5 Times; 3= 6-9 Times; 4= 10-19 Times; 5= 20-39 Times; 6= 40+ Times; 999= Not Answered

ElementDescription: Have you had psychedelics (such as LSD, Mescaline, peyote, PCP, mushrooms) in the past 12 months?
Notes: 1= Yes; 2= No;3 = No, but I had it prior to the last 12 months; 999= Not Answered

ElementDescription: Have you had cocaine (coke, crake) in the last 12 months?
Notes: 1= Yes; 2= No;3 = No, but I had it prior to the last 12 months; 999= Not Answered

ElementDescription: Have you had amphetamins (such as uppers, speed, bennies, not diet pills) in the last 12 months?
Notes: 1= Yes; 2= No;3 = No, but I had it prior to the last 12 months; 999= Not Answered

ElementDescription: Have you had quaaludes (such as quads, spoors, methaqulaone) in the last 12 months?
Notes: 1= Yes; 2= No;3 = No, but I had it prior to the last 12 months; 999= Not Answered

ElementDescription: Have you had barbiturates (such as downs, goofballs, yellows, blues) in the last 12 months?
Notes: 1= Yes; 2= No; 999= Not Answered

ElementDescription: Have you had tranquilizers (such as Librium, Valium) in the last 12 months?
Notes: 1= Yes; 2= No;3 = No, but I had it prior to the last 12 months; 999= Not Answered

ElementDescription: Have you had heroin (smack, horse, skag) in the last 12 months?
Notes: 1= Yes; 2= No;3 = No, but I had it prior to the last 12 months; 999= Not Answered

ElementDescription: Have you had othernarcotics (such as methadone, opium, morphine, codeine, Demerol) in the last 12 months?
Notes: 1= Yes; 2= No; 999= Not Answered

ElementDescription: Have you had inhalants (such as glue, aerosol cans, gases, correction fluid) in the last 12 months?
Notes: 1= Yes; 2= No;3 = No, but I had it prior to the last 12 months; 999= Not Answered

ElementDescription: I first smoked...
Notes: 0= Never; 1::17= Age in years; 999= Not Answered

Notes: 0= Never; 1::17= Age in years; 999= Not Answered

ElementDescription: I first got high...
Notes: 0= Never; 1::17= Age in years; 999= Not Answered

ElementDescription: I first used marijuana regularly...
Notes: 0= Never; 1::17= Age in years; 999= Not Answered

ElementDescription: I had my first drink...
Notes: 0= Never; 1::17= Age in years; 999= Not Answered

ElementDescription: I first got drunk...
Notes: 0= Never; 1::17= Age in years; 999= Not Answered

ElementDescription: I first got drunk at lease once a week...
Notes: 0= Never; 1::17= Age in years; 999= Not Answered

Notes: 0= Never; 1::17= Age in years; 999= Not Answered
